Recent Work

Security Research & Development

Tools and platforms I've built to improve cybersecurity practices

Oracle - Software Developer, Global Product Security

Currently working as a Software Developer in Oracle's Global Product Security team, where I focus on building security automation tools and vulnerability intelligence platforms. I build AI tools to automate vulnerability management processes, improving the efficiency and accuracy of security assessments.

AI/ML CVSS Scoring Security Automation Vulnerability Research Product Security Enterprise Security Security Tools Threat Intelligence

Role: Software Developer, Global Product Security

Duration: February 2025 - Present

Focus: AI-powered security automation, CVSS scoring automation, and vulnerability management platforms

Impact: Contributing to Oracle's comprehensive security posture and product protection through intelligent automation

OCPPStorm: A Comprehensive Fuzzing Tool for OCPP Implementations

A comprehensive black box fuzzing tool that identified multiple critical vulnerabilities in OCPP implementations, leading to the discovery of CVEs and improved security for electric vehicle charging infrastructure. The tool employs multiple fuzzing strategies including Random Fuzzer, State Machine Fuzzer, and Isla Fuzzer.

Python Fuzzing OCPP CVE Research Protocol Security

Results: 6 CVEs discovered and assigned

Publication: Network and Distributed System Security (VehicleSec) 2024 - NDSS Symposium

Impact: Improved security of electric vehicle charging infrastructure. All the CVEs were addressed and fixed by the OCPP implementers.
